hero.title: LAGREE, BUT MAKE IT LIKE A STARLETTE.
hero.p1_line1: IS THE FIRST MICROLAGREE STUDIO IN ISRAEL —

hero.more: MORE THAN JUST A WORKOUT. A WHOLE UNIVERSE.
hero.italic: FOR WOMEN WHO TRAIN LIKE STARS — AND SHINE LIKE THEM.
hero.ready: READY TO FEEL LIKE A STAR?

experience.title: THE STARLETTE EXPERIENCE
experience.p1_bold: REVEAL THE BEST VERSION OF YOURSELF.
experience.p1_end: CREATED BY A WOMAN, FOR WOMEN.
experience.p2_intro: THE LAGREE METHOD HAS FINALLY ARRIVED IN ISRAEL.
experience.p2_details4: IN AN INTIMATE AND INSPIRING ENVIRONMENT.
experience.p3: HERE, TRANSFORMATION GOES BEYOND THE PHYSICAL—
experience.p3_second: IT'S EMOTIONAL, MENTAL, AND ENERGETIC TOO.

newway.title: A NEW WAY TO MOVE
newway.p1_part2: AN INNOVATIVE METHOD THAT PUSHES THE LIMITS OF TRADITIONAL PILATES
newway.p2_end: SESSIONS. ON THE MICRO DELUXE YOU'LL EXPERIENCE A WHOLE NEW WAY TO TRAIN.
newway.p3: SLOW, CONTROLLED, AND TARGETED MOVEMENTS. STRENGTH AND CARDIO COMBINED - A COMPLETE WORKOUT WITH PROVEN RESULTS.
newway.p4: FOR THOSE WHO LOVE TO CHALLENGE THEMSELVES — WITH ELEGANCE, STRENGTH, AND POWER.

bullets.one: Our welcome offer is valid step once, you may choose one of the two available options.
bullets.two: Buy the special deal combo up to 24 hours before the class start to be can cancel with 100 obstacle (no class pass).
bullets.three: All trial memberships expire after one month and cannot be extended, frozen, or reclaimed.
